title: Protecting your kids from heat stress this summer 22 hours ago
content: NEDERLAND —   School is out, which means summer vacation has arrived; and so has the heat.    This weekend, the heat index will reach temperatures over 100 degrees.    Parents, make sure your children are properly hydrated and that they take breaks from playing outside. Bring water or cups with you when you go outside, and make use of the public water fountains.    If your child seems to be dehydrated, take them into an air conditioned room or let them sit in cool water.    Summer should be about having fun in the sun! So don't let heat stress ruin it!
